name: Motorcycle Looking glass
description: Product details of Handlebar end Grip Side Mirror for Motorcycle Looking glass.This mirrors a specially designed mirror for looking back vehicles or stuffs without turning their head backward while riding motorcycle.Usually it’s attached at the handle of the motorcycle.

name: spark plug
description: spark plug for APACHE RTR ALL MODEL long thread 2 head sparc plug Motorcycle 150/160CC.The three-stage ignition design increases the distance of flashover and increases the length of the arc. It is not easy to form carbon deposits after a long time of use, thereby achieving the effect of fuel saving.

name: ENUMA MVXZ2 CHAIN KIT
description: Sooner or later even the best, and best-loved, motorcycle needs a new chain and sprocket set. When that day comes, it would be a wise move to treat your machine to the compatible MVXZ-2 chain from Enuma, complete with front and rear sprockets. These kits are very rugged and also have an amazingly long life compared to others, even with tough treatment. What's more, the choice of chain colours means you can give your motorcycle a real eye-catching feature!.

name: Sergio M.
review: I didn't think I'd be using the touchscreen as much as I thought. It is super smooth like you'd expect a high end tablet.

name: Daniel G. Alexis
review: Coming from a traditional laptop, this is an amazing option if you want a truly versatile and convenient computer. I wouldn't expect to play games at the highest settings but for it's price point it makes sense.

name: yaniv.shams
review: Good for daily tasks like web browsing and office work. not for gaming. screen is ok the 1080 resolution is not the best. size is great and keyboard is great. touch screed is a fun extra. not worth more then 600$

name: Walter F Rodriguez
review: The processor is fantastic and can handle anything I throw at it, including some light gaming. I'm a fan of the design and, while it's a little heavier than typical ultrabooks, it's not a huge weight as I take it with me through my day.

name: Zention
review: Una cosa que no me ha gustado es la disposición del botón de encendido/apagado. Está en el lateral derecho y en ocaciónes lo presiono sin querer al momento de moverla o voltearla a modo tableta; no es nada grave pero estaría mejor integrado junto al teclado, o incluso en el sensor de huella.

name: Claudio Monzoni
review: La laptop es buena por el precio, me gusto que se siente bien construida aunque sea de plástico, la pantalla no tiene buenos colores, tienden a verse deslavados.  Un error que no me gusto es que los controladores de video no estan optimizados y hay glitches en la pantalla, supongo es cuestión de tiempo que los arreglen

name: liz
review: We bought this laptop as a Christmas gift for my daughter. We were very pleased with the screen quality and touch screen. Also, what you get with this laptop is extraordinary. You can’t beat the price for what you’re getting. I would definitely buy another one. Kind of wish I needed another one
